Commands








































Fun Commands
Moderation Commands
Utility Commands
Fact Commands



Fun Commands
F?Trivia

Usage - Say F?Trivia to get a random trivia question!In Trivia, you get a random question and you have 10 seconds to answer it. You must answer with the answer number it is instead of the written answer or you won't get it right.
Aliases - F?Triv / F?Quiz / F?trv

F?Coinflip

Usage - Play this game of luck, and guess whether the answer will be heads or tails!
Aliases - F?Hot / F?Cf / F?Headsortails / F?Flip / F?Coin

F?Lovemeter

Usage - Use the bot to find the love between you and another member.
Aliases - F?Love / F?L

F?Topic

Usage - Chat activity going down? Use this command to get some random topics for you and your members to chat about!
Aliases - F?Tpc / F?Topics

F?Fact

Usage - Sends some random facts into the channel. There are many different categories to choose from so be sure to check out Fact Commands
Aliases - F?Facts / F?Fct




Moderation Commands
F?Ban

Usage - Use this to ban bad users. You can add a reason for the ban but its optional so you can choose.
Aliases - F?B

F?Kick

Usage - This command is used to kick bad users. It's like a ban exept the member you kicked can join back at any time.
Aliases - F?K

F?Mute

Usage - Can be used to mute a member of the server if they break any server rules.
Aliases - F?M

F?Unmute

Usage - Unmutes a member if you think they didn't need to be muted, or you made a mistake when muteing them.
Aliases - F?Um

F?Warn

Usage - This command can be used to warn a member of the server when they break any rules.
Aliases - F?W

F?Warns

Usage - NOT AVAILIABLE YET! Use this command to view all the warns for a specific member in the server.
Aliases - F?Modlogs

F?Purge

Usage - Use this command to mass delete messages. The maximum amount of messages deleted at a time is 100.
Aliases - F?Clear / F?P / F?Pur




Utility Commands
F?Avatar

Usage - Use this command to get the avatar of a specific member.
Aliases - F?Av

F?Botinfo

Usage - This command gives you the information of FeeshBot.
Aliases - F?Bi / F?Info

F?Serverinfo

Usage - Gets you some information about the server you use it in.
Aliases - F?Server / F?Svr / F?Si / F?Guild / F?Guildinfo

F?Whois

Usage - This command gives you the information about a mentioned member in the server.
Aliases - F?Ui / F?Userinfo

F?Vote

Usage - Gives some links so you can vote for Feesh on Top.gg or DiscordBotList.com
Aliases - F?V / F?Votes

F?Support

Usage - Sends a link to the support server.
Aliases - F?Error / F?Bugs

F?Suggestion

Usage - Finds a channel in the server called suggestions and sends the suggestion
Aliases - F?Suggestions / F?Suggest / F?Suggests

F?Invite

Usage - Sends the link for you to invite FeeshBot to other servers
Aliases - F?Botinvite

F?Status

Usage - Use this command to get the server count and uptime count for the bot.
Aliases - F?Stats / F?Uptime




Fact Commands
F?Fact

Usage - Sends some random facts into the channel
Aliases - F?Facts / F?Fct

F?Animalfact

Usage - Sends a random fact about animals
Aliases - F?Animal / F?Animalfacts / F?Af

F?Sportfact

Usage - Sends some random facts about sport into the channel
Aliases - F?Sport / F?Sportfacts / F?Sf

F?Worldfact

Usage - Gets some random facts about the world.
Aliases - F?World / F?Worldfacts / F?Wf

F?Recordfact

Usage - Sends some random facts into the channel
Aliases - F?Record / F?Worldrecord / F?Worldrecords / F?Recordfacts / F?Rf
